mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TYPE FROM "BOARD" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_TYPE, MEMBER_NO FROM "BOARD" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
